ROM.Changelog:
==================== 03-31-2018 ====================
* device/samsung/exynos7870-common/ f975b5a Nuke lineage.dependencies [lzzy12] * device/samsung/j7velte/ f6fa820 j7velte: We are moving to official [lzzy12] * frameworks/base/ 035fedf base: lock: Allow skipping secure discard of Screen Lock keys [Kshitij Gupta] * frameworks/native/ 3944469 Fix resampling for multiple pointers [Sagar Shah] * hardware/qcom/audio-caf/msm8996/ 549e801 qahw_api: Ignore missing dependency [Rashed Abdel-Tawab] * hardware/qcom/audio-caf/msm8998/ 56eeef3 audio: add amplifier hooks for stream parameter manipulation [Daniel Hillenbrand] * hardware/samsung/ adee7a1 Non Lineage ROMs can't build Advanced Display, hence nuke it [lzzy12]
==================== 03-30-2018 ====================
* frameworks/av/ 594cd59 Revert "ACodec: Fix video autoscaling on old OMX decoders" [Sagar Shah] * hardware/cosmic/interfaces/ 5272b78 Revert "Camed HAL extension: Added support in HIDL for Extended FD." [Sagar Shah] * hardware/interfaces/ 534abda camera: Only link and use vendor.qti.hardware.camera.device if specified [Sagar Shah] * kernel/samsung/exynos7870/ 948c43b j5y17lte: Disable Mali debug sysfs [ananjaser1211] * vendor/cos/ d8c89b8 devices: Add official support for j7velte (#83) [Sagar Shah] * vendor/ota/ 08f7f90 OTA:Update potter (30/03/2018) (#122) [Sagar Shah]
==================== 03-29-2018 ====================
* build/make/ adbc8d2 Don't enable ANDROID_BINDER_IPC_32BIT for mixed userspace/kernel [Sagar Shah] * hardware/samsung_slsi-cm/exynos5/ c22ad1f Build mcDriverDaemon only for FP devices [lzzy12] * vendor/ota/
